item.description:
Do you know your car has a black box?

 

What should the state be able to require ISPs keep on file about their customers Internet usage?

 

How have attitudes about privacy changed in recent years?   Is technology making privacy harder to keep?

 

What is a reasonable expectation of privacy in this age of GPS, smartphones, Google and Facebook? Come join us for a discussion of privacy.

 

Just RSVP "yes", and everyone will know where you'll be Friday night. ;-)

The formal meetup runs until 9PM, then we'll head over to Orleans for an after party.

 

Note: Event date subject to change.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us at the large table all the way in back.
item.name: Privacy
